text:
Jorge Brovetto Cruz (14 February 1933 – 8 June 2019) was a Uruguayan chemical engineer, academic and politician. He was born in Montevideo. He served as President of the Broad Front (2004–2012) and as Minister of Education and Culture (2005–2008). He was also Rector of the University of the Republic, Montevideo.
Brovetto died on 8 June 2019 in Montevideo, at the age of 86.
